title: PlayStation Showcase Coming Next Week! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.02.21
description:
The Garcia/Gettys Information Squad talk about the upcoming PlayStation Showcase and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:01:00 - Housekeeping
TODAY Surgeon Simulator 2 is FINALLY here, and SnowBikeMike is going to play it on launch day. The catch? Kevin is going to use IRL robotic arms to mess with Mike while Tim and Joey hang out! Thursday at 11AM PT on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames the VOD will then go up on youtube.com/kindafunnyplays
Starting today on Twitch it's SUB-TEMBER! Viewers across the platform throughout the month can take advantage of 20% off subscriptions for first-time subscribers and gifted subs. Your support means the world to us here at Kinda Funny and right now you can take advantage of this deal and receive benefits like ad-free viewing, sub emotes, and more.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack &The Kinda Funny Destiny 2 PC Clan
The Roper Report  -
00:01:54 - PlayStation’s Showcase Plans - PS Blog
00:21:00 - Horizon Forbidden West Not Having an Option to Upgrade from the PS4 Version. - PlayStation FAQs
00:30:40 - Ad
00:31:45 - THQ Digital Showcase Event - Eurogamer
00:41:20 - Twitch Results - Eurogamer
00:47:45 - Out today
00:52:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing & Tim
